00066         template <typename T, precision P> 
00067         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat2x3<T, P>::tmat2x3()
00068         {
00069                 this->value[0] = col_type(T(1), T(0), T(0));
00070                 this->value[1] = col_type(T(0), T(1), T(0));
00071         }

00110         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat2x3<T, P>::tmat2x3
00111         (
00112                 T const & x0, T const & y0, T const & z0,
00113                 T const & x1, T const & y1, T const & z1
00114         )
00115         {
00116                 this->value[0] = col_type(x0, y0, z0);
00117                 this->value[1] = col_type(x1, y1, z1);

00132         // Conversion constructors
00133         template <typename T, precision P>
00134         template <
00135                 typename X1, typename Y1, typename Z1,
00136                 typename X2, typename Y2, typename Z2>
00137         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat2x3<T, P>::tmat2x3
00138         (
00139                 X1 const & x1, Y1 const & y1, Z1 const & z1,
00140                 X2 const & x2, Y2 const & y2, Z2 const & z2
00141         )
00142         {
00143                 this->value[0] = col_type(static_cast<T>(x1), value_type(y1), value_type(z1));
00144                 this->value[1] = col_type(static_cast<T>(x2), value_type(y2), value_type(z2));
00145         }

00148         template <typename V1, typename V2>
00149         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat2x3<T, P>::tmat2x3
00150         (
00151                 tvec3<V1, P> const & v1,

00153         )
00154         {
00155                 this->value[0] = col_type(v1);

00434         template <typename T, precision P>
00435         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER typename tmat2x3<T, P>::col_type operator*
00436         (
00437                 tmat2x3<T, P> const & m,
00438                 typename tmat2x3<T, P>::row_type const & v)
00439         {
00440                 return typename tmat2x3<T, P>::col_type(
00441                         m[0][0] * v.x + m[1][0] * v.y,
00442                         m[0][1] * v.x + m[1][1] * v.y,
00443                         m[0][2] * v.x + m[1][2] * v.y);
00444         }
00445 
00446         template <typename T, precision P>
00447         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER typename tmat2x3<T, P>::row_type operator*
00448         (
00449                 typename tmat2x3<T, P>::col_type const & v,
00450                 tmat2x3<T, P> const & m)
00451         {
00452                 return typename tmat2x3<T, P>::row_type(
00453                         v.x * m[0][0] + v.y * m[0][1] + v.z * m[0][2],
00454                         v.x * m[1][0] + v.y * m[1][1] + v.z * m[1][2]);
00455         }
00456 
00457         template <typename T, precision P>
00458         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat2x3<T, P> operator*
00459         (
00460                 tmat2x3<T, P> const & m1,
00461                 tmat2x2<T, P> const & m2
00462         )
00463         {
00464                 return tmat2x3<T, P>(
00465                         m1[0][0] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[0][1],
00466                         m1[0][1] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[0][1],
00467                         m1[0][2] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][2] * m2[0][1],
00468                         m1[0][0] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[1][1],
00469                         m1[0][1] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[1][1],
00470                         m1[0][2] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][2] * m2[1][1]);
00471         }
00472 
00473         template <typename T, precision P>
00474         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x3<T, P> operator*
00475         (
00476                 tmat2x3<T, P> const & m1,
00477                 tmat3x2<T, P> const & m2
00478         )
00479         {
00480                 T SrcA00 = m1[0][0];
00481                 T SrcA01 = m1[0][1];
00482                 T SrcA02 = m1[0][2];
00483                 T SrcA10 = m1[1][0];
00484                 T SrcA11 = m1[1][1];
00485                 T SrcA12 = m1[1][2];
00486 
00487                 T SrcB00 = m2[0][0];
00488                 T SrcB01 = m2[0][1];
00489                 T SrcB10 = m2[1][0];
00490                 T SrcB11 = m2[1][1];
00491                 T SrcB20 = m2[2][0];
00492                 T SrcB21 = m2[2][1];
00493 
00494                 tmat3x3<T, P> Result(tmat3x3<T, P>::_null);
00495                 Result[0][0] = SrcA00 * SrcB00 + SrcA10 * SrcB01;
00496                 Result[0][1] = SrcA01 * SrcB00 + SrcA11 * SrcB01;
00497                 Result[0][2] = SrcA02 * SrcB00 + SrcA12 * SrcB01;
00498                 Result[1][0] = SrcA00 * SrcB10 + SrcA10 * SrcB11;
00499                 Result[1][1] = SrcA01 * SrcB10 + SrcA11 * SrcB11;
00500                 Result[1][2] = SrcA02 * SrcB10 + SrcA12 * SrcB11;
00501                 Result[2][0] = SrcA00 * SrcB20 + SrcA10 * SrcB21;
00502                 Result[2][1] = SrcA01 * SrcB20 + SrcA11 * SrcB21;
00503                 Result[2][2] = SrcA02 * SrcB20 + SrcA12 * SrcB21;
00504                 return Result;
00505         }
00506 
00507         template <typename T, precision P>
00508         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat4x3<T, P> operator*
00509         (
00510                 tmat2x3<T, P> const & m1,
00511                 tmat4x2<T, P> const & m2
00512         )
00513         {
00514                 return tmat4x3<T, P>(
00515                         m1[0][0] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[0][1],
00516                         m1[0][1] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[0][1],
00517                         m1[0][2] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][2] * m2[0][1],
00518                         m1[0][0] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[1][1],
00519                         m1[0][1] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[1][1],
00520                         m1[0][2] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][2] * m2[1][1],
00521                         m1[0][0] * m2[2][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[2][1],
00522                         m1[0][1] * m2[2][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[2][1],
00523                         m1[0][2] * m2[2][0] + m1[1][2] * m2[2][1],
00524                         m1[0][0] * m2[3][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[3][1],
00525                         m1[0][1] * m2[3][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[3][1],
00526                         m1[0][2] * m2[3][0] + m1[1][2] * m2[3][1]);
00527         }

00530         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat2x3<T, P> operator/

00532                 tmat2x3<T, P> const & m,

00542         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat2x3<T, P> operator/

00553         // Unary constant operators
00554         template <typename T, precision P>
00555         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat2x3<T, P> const operator-
00556         (
00557                 tmat2x3<T, P> const & m
00558         )
00559         {

00566         // Boolean operators
00567 
00568         template <typename T, precision P>
00569         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool operator==
00570         (
00571                 tmat2x3<T, P> const & m1,
00572                 tmat2x3<T, P> const & m2
00573         )
00574         {
00575                 return (m1[0] == m2[0]) && (m1[1] == m2[1]);
00576         }
00577 
00578         template <typename T, precision P>
00579         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool operator!=
00580         (
00581                 tmat2x3<T, P> const & m1,
00582                 tmat2x3<T, P> const & m2
00583         )
00584         {
00585                 return (m1[0] != m2[0]) || (m1[1] != m2[1]);
00586         }
